languages.text: "Я — с тобой. Буди эту тварь, закуем ее в кандалы вместе".
"I am with you. Wake the beast, and let us shackle it together."
languages.original_text: "Я — с тобой. Буди эту тварь, закуем ее в кандалы вместе".

traits.locale_text: "I'm with you. Wake up this thing — we will chain it up."
"I'm with you. Wake up this thing — we will chain it up."
"I'm with you. Wake up this thing—let's chain it up."
"I'm with you. Wake up this thing—let's chain it up."
"I am with you. Wake the beast, and let us shackle it together."
"I am with you. Wake the beast, and let us shackle it together."

languages.text: « Je suis avec vous. Réveillez la bête et enchaînons-la ensemble. »
languages.original_text: "I am with you. Wake the beast, and let us shackle it together."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis avec vous. Réveillez la bête et enchaînons-la ensemble. »

languages.text: «Estoy con usted. Despierte a la bestia y encadenémosla juntos».
languages.original_text: "I am with you. Wake the beast, and let us shackle it together."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy con usted. Despierte a esta cosa; es hora de encadenarla».

languages.text: “我支持你的计划。唤醒这头怪物吧，我们一起把它锁起来。”
languages.original_text: "I am with you. Wake the beast, and let us shackle it together."

traits.locale_text: “我支持你的计划。唤醒这头怪物吧，我们一起把它锁起来。”

languages.text: "Ich bin Eurer Meinung. Weckt das Monster, legen wir es gemeinsam in Ketten."
languages.original_text: "I am with you. Wake the beast, and let us shackle it together."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin bei Euch. Weckt das Ding auf, legen wir es in Ketten."

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}も共に行こう。獣を目覚めさせて、鎖をかけるのだ」
languages.original_text: "I am with you. Wake the beast, and let us shackle it together."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}も共に行こう。獣を目覚めさせて、鎖をかけるのだ」

languages.text: "Yanınızdayım. Canavarı uyandırın, onu birlikte zincire vuralım."
languages.original_text: "I am with you. Wake the beast, and let us shackle it together."
